entry.title: Game: Sin & Punishment: Star Successor (Wii, 2010) (9)
entry.content: Tonight, I got to 690/3500 health, in only about 20 minutes. I'm getting better.

entry.title: Game: Sin & Punishment: Star Successor (Wii, 2010) (8)
entry.content: I had a brutalizing experience with Commander Deko tonight. I fought him for like 3 hours. The closest I ever got was about 880/3500 health. It's sooooo hard.

entry.title: Game: Sin & Punishment: Star Successor (Wii, 2010) (7)
entry.content: Got to the next boss! I played for like an hour tonight trying over and over again... but I did it! Only two more bosses to go!

entry.title: Game: Donkey Kong Country Returns (Wii, 2010) (5)
entry.content: We played three levels tonight. It was pretty fun. My wife and I had a bit of a disagreement about what was fun about the game. She really likes collecting everything and exploring the area, trying to do harder things. In contrast, I find that annoying and prefer to just go through the obstacle course as fast as possible. But, the secret of marital bliss is she tells me what to do, and I do it, so I repented. =)

entry.title: Game: Rhythm Heaven Fever (Wii, 2012)
entry.content: We played this for the first time tonight and my wife got a medal on her first try at "Hole in One" (although she did watch me be terrible at it for about 5 minutes.) Very fun.
